Home.title: Welcome to Super Waiter project!
Home.description: Automate your kitchen — easy, fast and reliable.

Hero.description: The most reliable solution for automating the food service system worldwide.

Pricing.title: Super Waiter Plans
Pricing.desc: A convenient and efficient system for any kitchen or café. Admin panel, order management, and check printing — all ready for you.

basic.title: Basic
basic.desc: The most affordable option for small kitchens.

standard.title: Standard
standard.desc: Optimal choice for medium cafés and restaurants.

About.title: Why Super Waiter?
About.intro: To run the Super Waiter system, you don't need any special devices - a regular computer or laptop is enough. This significantly reduces costs. At the same time, you can connect as many printers as you want and fully integrate them with the system.

sections.title: Unify all your systems on one platform
sections.desc: Super Waiter combines your restaurant, café, or fast-food operations into one unified management system. Orders, staff, receipt printing, and accounting — all in one place.

sections.title: 2 apps – one system
sections.desc: After installing SO, you get two apps: one for waiters to receive orders, and another for admins to manage and analyze operations. Both work on computers and mobile devices.

sections.title: Track reports and sales from anywhere
sections.desc: The admin panel is cloud-based, allowing access from anywhere with an internet connection. Daily sales, warehouse, staff, and customer reports are always available.

sections.title: Easy setup and automatic updates
sections.desc: Installing SO takes just a few minutes. Updates are delivered automatically, with no manual configuration required.

sections.title: Full Warehouse Control
sections.desc: The SO warehouse module automatically tracks all product movements. As each dish is prepared, used ingredients are deducted automatically, the remaining stock is displayed accurately, and the system notifies you when supplies are running low.

sections.title: Fully Customizable Receipt Design
sections.desc: SO allows you to create receipts exactly the way you want. You can customize the layout, change the style, edit text formats, and add your restaurant or café logo for a beautifully branded receipt. Whether it’s a simple layout or a premium design, SO lets you generate clean, professional receipts that match your identity.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.desc: If you have any questions, suggestions, or collaboration ideas, feel free to reach out.
Contact.trial: We offer you a 1-month FREE trial period!
Contact.footer: Your feedback matters — every thought helps us improve the project!

Footer.desc: Unify your restaurant and café systems on one platform — managing orders, payments, and staff has never been easier.

Demo.warning: Attention! The demo version may be a bit slow at times, as it is hosted on a budget server. Contact us for full capabilities.
